Select a site with the following characteristics:

  • Near a water source

  • Well-drained and with adequate wind breaks during the wet season

  • Rolling or upland where water logging is not a problem during wet season

  • Not infected with wilt diseases

  • Not planted previously with crop of the same family as tomato

  • Sandy loam or clay loam, with soil pH of 6.0-7.0

Â 

The following are the recommended periods of planting for optimum harvest:

  • Hot/summer condition: February/March (off-season;

  • Hot/wet condition: May/June (off-season)

  • Wet/cool condition: August/September (off-season)

  • Cool condition: November/December (regular season)
